# ukumawapi_post_incident (Resource)

PostIncident Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ukumawapi_post_incident" "my_postincident" {
  content = "...my_content..."
  slug    = "...my_slug..."
  style   = "primary"
  title   = "...my_title..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String) Requires replacement if changed.
- `slug` (String) Requires replacement if changed.
- `title` (String) Requires replacement if changed.

### Optional

- `style` (String) Enumerate incident styles. Default: "primary"; must be one of ["info", "warning", "danger", "primary", "light", "dark"]; Requires replacement if changed.

### Read-Only

- `created_date` (String)
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `pin` (Boolean)
